rows.label: bf04030170_0010
rows.name: That was five hundred years ago...

rows.label: bf04030170_0030
rows.name:
The man who awakened Hikari was Adel,
hero of the lost Kingdom of Iira.

rows.label: bf04030170_0040
rows.name:
Adel fought as Hikari's Driver
to protect the world from Metsu.

rows.label: bf04030170_0050
rows.name:
We Divine Beasts played our part
in that battle, too.

rows.label: bf04030170_0060
rows.name: 'Living with humans' is the fate of us, Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf04030170_0080
rows.name:
Adel hid Homura's sleeping body
inside a great ship...

rows.label: bf04030170_0090
rows.name:
And sunk her to the Cloud Sea's floor,
where none could abuse her power.

rows.label: bf04030170_0100
rows.name: So that day, that's the ship that we...

rows.label: bf04030170_0110
rows.name:
I believe...it was fate
that we met each other.

rows.label: bf04030170_0120
rows.name: Otherwise, Hikari-chan would never have woken up.

rows.label: bf04030170_0130
rows.name: You talk about Hikari-chan like you're really fond of her.

rows.label: bf04030170_0140
rows.name:
Hikari-chan and I used to talk together,
in that dream of Eden where you met me.

rows.label: bf04030170_0150
rows.name:
We promised that, when we were awakened again,
we'd return home to Eden.

rows.label: bf04030170_0160
rows.name:
And then, we would fulfill
our real purpose...
